title: MOOC-Based Mathematical Leadership Capacity Building Program for Transitioning to Online Graduate Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen math-based decision-making and self-directed learning competencies needed for transitioning to online graduate programs for corporate managers/leaders. Blended learning environment constructed using BYOD

learning_goals: Learners can independently analyze graduate-level mathematical content at over 80% proficiency by applying online learning strategies acquired through MOOCs.
Learners can systematically document and share the process of solving mathematical problems using digital tools (graphing calculators, collaboration platforms, etc.).
Learners can establish a learning plan using self-directedness assessment tools required in online learning environments and achieve over 70% feasibility.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
